meanings.definition: A dish of stewed or fried pieces of meat served in a thick white sauce.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious fricassee for the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the fricassee at the restaurant and it was flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The fricassee looked so good that it made my mouth water.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the fricassee filled the kitchen, enticing everyone.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's secret recipe for fricassee was passed down through generations.

meanings.definition: To prepare (meat) by cutting into pieces and cooking in a sauce.
meanings.sent1: She decided to fricassee the chicken for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: The chef will fricassee the beef before adding the special sauce.
meanings.sent3: I attempted to fricassee the pork, but it turned out too dry.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the fricassee cooking on the stove filled the house.
meanings.sent5: The chef's skillful hands quickly fricasseed the meat to perfection.
